subject: Order Information Request
description_text:
Hello, i placed an order for the Simsonn Pro X Ultras on 11/22/25. I never
got an order confirmation emailed or texted to me though my credit card has
been charged. I also paid extra for express shipping (2-5) days. I do not
have a order # or tracking # for the order. However the name and number on
the order is Ryan Woods and the phone number is 209-404-1469. Id appreciate
any update with my order and when i can expect to have it shipped and
delivered. Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Woods,     I noticed you didn't provide an email address, so you didn't receive the order confirmation and shipping notification. Here are your two logistics tracking links.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=395683999630&trkqual=12029~395683999630~FDEG https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=SF6047079989331

Thank you, i appreciate it

On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 6:07â€¯PM service@simsonn.com
